alert.note: Alert for Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 20 at 3:01AM CST until January 20 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Morrison County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST today. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 8 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
